metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19252 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
vcs_write in drivers/tty/vt/vc_screen.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.13does not prevent write access to vcsu devices, aka CID-0c9acb1af77a.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
